persona_aleph.description: Raw, unstructured data influx from the Logosphere. Represents immediate sensory input, chaotic associations, and unverified information.

persona_bet.description: Crystalline logical frameworks and first-principle axioms. Represents the underlying physics of a system.

axioms.label: string (e.g., 'Axiom of Flow')
axioms.statement: string (e.g., 'An asset in motion remains in motion unless acted upon by a node.')
axioms.parent_id: string (UUID) or null for root axioms

arbiter.description: The active process of mapping Aleph's chaotic data onto Bet's logical structures.

synthesis_links.weight: float (0.0 to 1.0, represents the confidence/strength of the synthesis)
